languages.text: "Почему ты так ненавидишь Иремерисс? Ты оказался в Прорве по собственной вине".
"Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."
languages.original_text: "Почему ты так ненавидишь Иремерисс? Ты оказался в Прорве по собственной вине".

traits.locale_text: "Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."
"Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."
"Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."
"Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."

languages.text: “你为什么这么憎恨伊芮梅莉斯？你之所以沦落到了裂隙之中，这都是你自己的错。”
languages.original_text: "Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."

traits.locale_text: “你为什么这么憎恨伊芮梅莉斯？你之所以沦落到了裂隙之中，这都是你自己的错。”

languages.text: 「なぜそれほどイレメリスを憎むのだ？裂け目に落ちたのはお前自身の責任だ」
languages.original_text: "Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜそれほどイレメリスを憎むのだ？裂け目に落ちたのはお前自身の責任だ」

languages.text: «¿Por qué odias tanto a Yremeryss? Fue culpa tuya que acabaras en el Abismo».
languages.original_text: "Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."

traits.locale_text: "¿Por qué odias tanto a Yremeryss? Fue culpa tuya que acabaras en el Abismo».

languages.text: « Pourquoi haïssez-vous Yremeryss à ce point ? Si vous avez fini dans l'Abîme, c'est uniquement par votre faute. »
languages.original_text: "Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi haïssez-vous Yremeryss à ce point ? Si vous avez fini dans l'Abîme, c'est uniquement par votre faute. »

languages.text: "Warum hasst Ihr Yremeryss so sehr? Es war Eure eigene Schuld, dass Ihr im Abgrund gelandet seid."
languages.original_text: "Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."

traits.locale_text: "Warum hasst Ihr Yremeryss so sehr? Es war Eure eigene Schuld, dass Ihr im Abgrund gelandet seid."

languages.text: "Yremeryss'ten neden bu kadar nefret ediyorsun? Kendini Yarık'ta bulman senin suçun."
languages.original_text: "Why do you hate Yremeryss so much? It was your own fault you ended up in the Chasm."

traits.locale_text: "Yremeryss'ten neden bu kadar nefret ediyorsun? Kendini Yarık'ta bulmak senin suçun."
